sub_title: Senior Customer Technical Service Officer at TATAsteel Packaging
summary:
I've experience in implementing ISO standards for Environmental and quality systems.
I've worked for 9 years as an Environmental Manager and in that period worked to fulfill a new permitt.
I've applied Lean principles in several Projects during this period and the last years.
In 2 years Product Management within HRC and Pickled coil I have build up experience on composing Product Policies, Roadmaps for Hot rol products, making sweetspot analysis and implement new product DP600HR for wheelmarket automotive.
Since end of 2013 I've been working as a Customer Technical Service Officer Packaging especially in Italian market. Besides the Italian market also customers in Switzerland, Austria and Germany are part of my portfolio. Within the Packaging business I have build up experience in laminated 3 piece products (including expanded) and aerosol components. 

Quality Excellence training, graduation in Practical Problem Solving including several projects using the principles of PPS, 6 sigma and using statistical means to improve performance and solve problems which can lead to serious trend changes.

Specialties: Working in and with teams. Building up a network around the job and maintain this during my career.
Interpersonal contacts, coaching and training.

profile_positions.description:
Focusing on and being at customers expecially for Italian market but also for Swiss, Austrian and German market.
Being the Technical link between customers, TATAsteel Packaging Quality Department, Production Department and Sales to ensure that both TSP and Customers are satisfied and working towards a "win win" situation.
Currently new and improved products are launched (e.g laminated products), this opens a new market and experience.
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Technical Service Officer

profile_positions.description:
Crucial subjects are Product Policy, Roadmaps and Sweetspot analysis. Furthermore the implementation of new product from a certain point in the fase of introducing a new product is an important subject. After implementing one of the important subject is intensify the production of that specific product and guard the margins.
The past half year two major projects were finished which enriched my experience. One project was the establishment of the first Roadmap HR in IJmuiden which was used as an example, the other project, which is still running, was the implementation of DP600HR (wheelmarket). That product also was the first product which was implemented via the new Productmanagement organisation and is often used as being "best practice".
profile_positions.title: Productspecialist Slab and Hot rolled

profile_positions.description:
Working as an Area Manager in the Area Oil, Water and furnaces of HSM2 at TATAsteel IJmuiden (after implementing ORBA; Production Manager). In this function, Safety, Environment, Quality and Production are the main points of responsibility for a so called “TRIO”. A TRIO consists of 5 Team leaders and 3 members dayshift. To achieve the objectives,  interpersonal contact is a very important point of particular interest. The Production Manager, together with the other team members (TRIO), is also responsible to create a list of needed skills and education for that area. 
In November 2010 there was an organization change in which the 3 existing areas where divided into 2 areas. So the existing area of Oil, Water and Furnaces became a bigger area because the rougher section of the mill was implemented into the new area: Half Produced Slab (HVP).
I was appointed as the Production Manager of that area. 
I have implemented 2 projects which consist the saving of personnel. This projects were done with the “Lean” philosophy.
In this period I made annual plans, monitored budget of small improvements and safety, dealt with ideas, composed monthly reports, reported those reports, composed and presented a Work Shop Process Safety and a Work Shop for a new production unit together with other presenters. 
Assessed new students (from April 2011). I also followed a training as Assessor to perform this task. 
I have helped to draw up the Process flows, FMEA and Control plans of the Area within the scope of ISO9000 and TS 16949.
profile_positions.title: Production Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working as an Area Technologist in the Roll Shop of HSM2 TATAsteel IJmuiden in which 3 points of interest are; roll technology, grinding technology and projects. This 3 points of interest are further developed during the 3 years I worked as an Area Technologist I also implemented several improvement projects, like a central water cleaning system, CBN grinding (pilot) and the conversion of the rougher’s in the rougher section from cast steel into forged steel. 
In this period I have communicated a lot in English due to the International contacts because several suppliers of rolls and grinding wheels are not located in Europe and the spoken language was always English. 
In 2006 I started the training Lean Coach did the full training and worked on several improvement projects.
profile_positions.title: Area technologist Roll Shop Hot Strip Mill2

profile_positions.description: Dust is an important environmental issue in an area were ore and cole is handeld. Also quality and producing based on a standard like ISO 900x is more ore less difficult because the work is often very "rough" due to the handlinggears. Therefor producing via standards seems like impossible, but we managed to implement an ISO 9002 standard in the organisation of GSB with a certification in 2005.
profile_positions.title: Quality, Health and Environmental Manager

profile_positions.description: In that period Environmental issues were important but difficult to implement in the exsisting culture. ISO 14001 was implemented in that period and that was a victory. Nowadays Environmental issues are still difficult but more easier to implement due to the changed culture. Also Waste Management was totally new and I started this to reduce the costs and filosify of sorting waste.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Manager at Packaging Steel

skills: German language understanding, speaking and writing
English language understanding, speaking and writing
Italian language understanding, speaking and writing
